verses.verse: בָּעֵ֨ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֜וא <S%H1931><s%> he אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me פְּסָל־ <S%H6458><s%> unto me Hew לְךָ֞ שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> thee two לוּחֹ֤ת <S%H3871><s%> tables אֲבָנִים֙ <S%H68><s%> of stone כָּרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <S%H7223><s%> like unto the first וַעֲלֵ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> and come up אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to הָהָ֑רָה <S%H2022><s%> unto me into the mount וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and make לְּךָ֖ אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> thee an ark עֵֽץ׃ <S%H6086><s%> of wood

וְאֶכְתֹּב֙ <S%H3789><s%> And I will write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <S%H3871><s%> on the tables אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַלֻּחֹ֥ת <S%H3871><s%> tables הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <S%H7223><s%> that were in the first אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which שִׁבַּ֑רְתָּ <S%H7665><s%> which thou brakest וְשַׂמְתָּ֖ם <S%H7760><s%> and thou shalt put בָּאָרֽוֹן׃ <S%H727><s%> them in the ark

וָאַ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And I made אֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> an ark עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֔ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim וָאֶפְסֹ֛ל <S%H6458><s%> and hewed שְׁנֵי־ <S%H8147><s%> two לֻחֹ֥ת <S%H3871><s%> tables אֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> of stone כָּרִאשֹׁנִ֑ים <S%H7223><s%> like unto the first וָאַ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> and went up הָהָ֔רָה <S%H2022><s%> into the mount וּשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> having the two הַלֻּחֹ֖ת <S%H3871><s%> tables בְּיָדִֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> in mine hand

וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <S%H3789><s%> And he wrote עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַלֻּחֹ֜ת <S%H3871><s%> on the tables כַּמִּכְתָּ֣ב <S%H4385><s%> writing הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <S%H7223><s%> according to the first אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> the ten הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּר֩ <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H413><s%> to you בָּהָ֛ר <S%H2022><s%> unto you in the mount מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> of the fire בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הַקָּהָ֑ל <S%H6951><s%> of the assembly וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> gave יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> then

וָאֵ֗פֶן <S%H6437><s%> And I turned וָֽאֵרֵד֙ <S%H3381><s%> myself and came down מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> from the mount וָֽאָשִׂם֙ <S%H7760><s%> and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <S%H3871><s%> the tables בָּאָר֖וֹן <S%H727><s%> in the ark אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֑יתִי <S%H6213><s%> which I had made וַיִּ֣הְיוּ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> and there כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוַּ֖נִי <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> and there they be as the LORD

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נָֽסְע֛וּ <S%H5265><s%> took their journey מִבְּאֵרֹ֥ת בְּנֵי־ יַעֲקָ֖ן <S%H885><s%> from Beeroth of the children of Jaakan מוֹסֵרָ֑ה <S%H4149><s%> to Mosera שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> There מֵ֤ת <S%H4191><s%> died אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> there Aaron וַיִּקָּבֵ֣ר <S%H6912><s%> and there he was buried שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> and there וַיְכַהֵ֛ן <S%H3547><s%> ministered in the priest's office אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <S%H499><s%> and Eleazar בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place

מִשָּׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there נָסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> From thence they journeyed הַגֻּדְגֹּ֑דָה <S%H1412><s%> unto Gudgodah וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from הַגֻּדְגֹּ֣דָה <S%H1412><s%> and from Gudgodah יָטְבָ֔תָה <S%H3193><s%> to Jotbath אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> a land נַֽחֲלֵי <S%H5158><s%> of rivers מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> of waters

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֗וא <S%H1931><s%> he הִבְדִּ֤יל <S%H914><s%> separated יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the tribe הַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi לָשֵׂ֖את <S%H5375><s%> to bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לַעֲמֹד֩ <S%H5975><s%> to stand לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְשָֽׁרְתוֹ֙ <S%H8334><s%> to minister וּלְבָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> unto him and to bless בִּשְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> in his name עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> after that לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not הָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> have לְלֵוִ֛י <S%H3881><s%> Leviite חֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> hath no part וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> nor inheritance עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> with his brethren יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> [is] his inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> promised יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> according as the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לֽוֹ׃

וְאָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> I עָמַ֣דְתִּי <S%H5975><s%> And I stayed בָהָ֗ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mount כַּיָּמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> time הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <S%H7223><s%> according to the first אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> forty י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> and forty לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> nights וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> also בַּפַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> unto me at that time הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> was not אָבָ֥ה <S%H14><s%> would יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> also [and] the LORD הַשְׁחִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7843><s%> not destroy

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me ק֛וּם <S%H6965><s%> unto me Arise לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> proceed לְמַסַּ֖ע <S%H4550><s%> [thy] journey לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וְיָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> that they may go in וְיִֽרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H3423><s%> and possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> which I sware לַאֲבֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> unto their fathers לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָהֶֽם׃ פ

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> And now Israel מָ֚ה <S%H4100><s%> what יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God שֹׁאֵ֖ל <S%H7592><s%> require מֵעִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but לְ֠יִרְאָה <S%H3372><s%> of thee but to fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לָלֶ֤כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to walk בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּרָכָיו֙ <S%H1870><s%> in all his ways וּלְאַהֲבָ֣ה <S%H157><s%> and to love אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְלַֽעֲבֹד֙ <S%H5647><s%> him and to serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> with all thy heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> and with all thy soul

לִשְׁמֹ֞ר <S%H8104><s%> To keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוֹ֤ת <S%H4687><s%> the commandments יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקֹּתָ֔יו <S%H2708><s%> and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day לְט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good לָֽךְ׃

הֵ֚ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD'S אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> Behold the heaven וּשְׁמֵ֣י <S%H8064><s%> and the heaven הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heavens הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בָּֽהּ׃

רַ֧ק <S%H7535><s%> but בַּאֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <S%H1><s%> in thy fathers חָשַׁ֥ק <S%H2836><s%> had a delight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Only the LORD לְאַהֲבָ֣ה <S%H157><s%> to love אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וַיִּבְחַ֞ר <S%H977><s%> them and he chose בְּזַרְעָ֣ם <S%H2233><s%> their seed אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H310><s%> after בָּכֶ֛ם מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> them [even] you above all people כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וּמַלְתֶּ֕ם <S%H4135><s%> Circumcise אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> עָרְלַ֣ת <S%H6190><s%> therefore the foreskin לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <S%H3824><s%> of your heart וְעָ֨רְפְּכֶ֔ם <S%H6203><s%> your neck לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no תַקְשׁ֖וּ <S%H7185><s%> and stiffen עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> longer

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> For יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> [is] God הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of gods וַאֲדֹנֵ֖י <S%H136><s%> and the Lord הָאֲדֹנִ֑ים <S%H113><s%> and Lord הָאֵ֨ל <S%H410><s%> God הַגָּדֹ֤ל <S%H1419><s%> a great הַגִּבֹּר֙ <S%H1368><s%> a mighty וְהַנּוֹרָ֔א <S%H3372><s%> and a terrible אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> which regardeth פָנִ֔ים <S%H6440><s%> not persons וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> nor taketh שֹֽׁחַד׃ <S%H7810><s%> reward

עֹשֶׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> He doth execute מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> the judgment יָת֖וֹם <S%H3490><s%> of the fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֑ה <S%H490><s%> and widow וְאֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> and loveth גֵּ֔ר <S%H1616><s%> the stranger לָ֥תֶת <S%H5414><s%> in giving ל֖וֹ לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> him food וְשִׂמְלָֽה׃ <S%H8071><s%> and raiment

וַאֲהַבְתֶּ֖ם <S%H157><s%> Love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגֵּ֑ר <S%H1616><s%> ye therefore the stranger כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גֵרִ֥ים <S%H1616><s%> for ye were strangers הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <S%H1961><s%> become בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God תִּירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> Thou shalt fear אֹת֣וֹ <S%H853><s%> תַעֲבֹ֑ד <S%H5647><s%> him shalt thou serve וּב֣וֹ תִדְבָּ֔ק <S%H1692><s%> and to him shalt thou cleave וּבִשְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> by his name תִּשָּׁבֵֽעַ׃ <S%H7650><s%> and swear

ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> He תְהִלָּתְךָ֖ <S%H8416><s%> He [is] thy praise וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> and He אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> and he [is] thy God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> that hath done אִתְּךָ֗ <S%H853><s%> אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגְּדֹלֹ֤ת <S%H1419><s%> for thee these great וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנּֽוֹרָאֹת֙ <S%H3372><s%> and terrible things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which רָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> have seen עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> which thine eyes

בְּשִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> with threescore and ten נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> persons יָרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> went down אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> Thy fathers מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> and now שָֽׂמְךָ֙ <S%H7760><s%> hath made יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> and now the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כְּכוֹכְבֵ֥י <S%H3556><s%> thee as the stars הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven לָרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> for multitude
